item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by Edward O. Wilson
item.description: "Perhaps the time has come to cease calling it the 'environmentalist' view, as though it were a lobbying effort outside the mainstream of human activity, and to start calling it the real-world view." -- Edward O. Wilson

item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by Pam Houston
item.description:
"Do you write novels?" I said.
"Novels, Lord no," she said. "I can't even stay married." -- Pam Houston

item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by Larry McMurtry
item.description:
"I just got gang-egged, or egg-banged or something."
--Sheriff Toots Burns." -- Larry McMurtry

item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by Larry McMurtry
item.description: "It ain’t dying I’m talking about, it’s living. I doubt it matters where you die, but it matters where you live.” ~spoken by Augustus McCrae" -- Larry McMurtry

item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by Larry McMurtry
item.description: "Only a rank degenerate would drive 1,500 miles across Texas without eating a chicken fried steak." -- Larry McMurtry

item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Woo woo, secret vampire stuff!" -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by MaryJanice Davidson
item.description: "Then she (Queen Christina) stood with the Prince and grinned like a monkey and waved like a fucked-up prom queen while about a thousand flashbulb went off in her face." -- MaryJanice Davidson

item.title: Bcoghill add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Here’s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris
